Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a red-brown pottery ribbed vessel, fabric partially grey in section, the interior is spotted with a dark-brown resinous deposit, the exterior is covered with a self-slip and remains of eight lines of Coptic text written in black ink, faded.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (393329) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/393329)
